section.title: What's this page about?
section.para: The task of the documentation team is the writing of a new manual for current and future generations of GIMP. The GIMP User Manual is a newly written User Manual, written for the GIMP Help Browser, but able to produce the Help pages for other media as well.

section.title: Goals?
section.para: Our goal is to provide a multilingual user manual for GIMP.
